translation.en: Why don't you order a pizza while you're at it?
translation.it: Perché non ordini anche una pizza?

translation.en: It looked like you were flying.
-Did that part hurt? -No, not unless I get dropped.
translation.it: - Quella parte fa male? - No, se non mi fanno cadere.

translation.en: Do they know you're auditioning for another company?
translation.it: Sanno che ti proporrai a un'altra compagnia?

translation.en: Can we all go get pizza? Please?
I can't, cookie. I've got to go pack.
translation.it: Non posso. Devo fare le valigie.

translation.en: Oh, my God. Dad's being so annoying.
translation.it: Oh, mio Dio. Papà è così irritante.

translation.en: He told me to go to bed and it's not even 10:00 yet.
translation.it: Ha detto di andare a letto e non sono neanche le 22.

translation.en: He treats me like a baby.
Why are you taking so much stuff?
translation.it: Perché ti porti così tanta roba?

translation.en: Your dad doesn't want me to go. That's why he's being so grouchy.
translation.it: Tuo papà non vuole che vada. Per questo è scontroso.

translation.en: We leave in ten minutes, come on.
I wouldn't be late if I didn't have to feed the chickens.
translation.it: Se tardo è perché devo sfamare le galline.

translation.en: [Segev] You're the one who wanted chickens!
Come here! I'll catch you. Come here!
translation.it: Vieni qui! Ti prendo. Vieni qui!

translation.en: [in English] I called Moshe. He'll be here any minute.
translation.it: Ho sentito Moshe. Sta per arrivare.

translation.en: Soccer. Did you remember your homework?
translation.it: Calcio. Ti sei ricordata di fare i compiti?

translation.en: -I could take you. -No, you have to take Ella.
translation.it: - Potevo portarti io. - No, devi portare Ella.

translation.en: Listen, the last thing I want to do is to stand in the way of your career.
translation.it: Ascolta, non voglio ostacolare la tua carriera.

translation.en: -If you have to move to New York-- -It's an audition.
translation.it: - Se devi trasferirti a New York... - È solo un'audizione.

translation.en: I probably won't even get the job, Segev.
-There'll be tons of dancers auditioning. -You'll get it. You're amazing.
translation.it: - Ci saranno centinaia di ballerine. - Ti prenderanno. Sei unica.

translation.en: But if you do, we have a lot of decisions to make.
translation.it: Ma poi avremo molte decisioni da prendere.

translation.en: -You sure you don't want me to take you? -I'm late as it is.
translation.it: - Allora non t'accompagno? - Sono già in ritardo.

translation.en: It's not a big deal. Be back in a week.
translation.it: Stai tranquillo. Torno tra una settimana.

translation.en: -Bring me something cool from New York? -Of course.
translation.it: - Mi porti qualcosa da New York? - Ma certo.
- Fai la brava, ok? - Ok. Ciao.

translation.en: Call me the minute you land, okay?
[in Hebrew] Take good care of her, Moshe.
-[Moshe in Hebrew] Of course. -Have a good trip.
What's up? Do you need something?
I'm supposed to meet someone here.
[in Hebrew] What is this? What kind of music is that?
translation.it: Cos'è? Che razza di musica è questa?

translation.en: -Put on some normal music. -["What is Love" playing]
-♪ Don't hurt me... ♪ -[in Hebrew] There's no way. No. Dad! ♪ No more ♪
Dad, no! Dad! Dad! ♪ What is love? Don't hurt me ♪
If Danielle gets that position in New York...
translation.it: Se prendono Danielle a New York...

translation.en: I'm never going to leave you. Never.
[in Hebrew] Quit, quit. Oh, my God.
-I've got my eye on you. -Quit, dad!
I've got my eye on you.
[in English] Here he is! Let's move it, gang!
I'm Segev, your highly recommended tour guide.
translation.it: Sono Segev, la vostra guida turistica.

translation.en: As you know, Israel is a land of Bedouins, desert and camels.
translation.it: Come sapete, Israele è terra di beduini, deserto e cammelli.

translation.en: Lucky for you, this is your camel for today.
translation.it: Per vostra fortuna, questo sarà il vostro cammello.

translation.en: So, Singer family, Israel may only exist 70 years,
translation.it: Allora, famiglia Singer, Israele esiste solo da 70 anni,

translation.en: but the history of the Jewish people goes back 4,000 years.
translation.it: ma la storia del popolo ebraico risale a 4.000 anni fa.

translation.en: -[Syd] What time's your flight? -[Danielle] In a couple hours.
translation.it: - A che ora è il volo? - Tra due ore.

translation.en: -I just wanted to say goodbye. -[Syd] Again?
You'll be back in a week.
This whole thing has me a little crazy.
I hate that you're doing this, you're not gonna find anything
translation.it: Non sopporto questa cosa, non troverai niente

translation.en: -better than we have here. -I gotta go.
translation.it: - meglio di ciò che hai qui. - Devo andare.

translation.en: Would you give this to him?
-you have to talk to him-- -I know. I love you.
translation.it: - devi parlargli... - Lo so. Ti voglio bene.

translation.en: [Moshe] So, if you get this job, Segev's gonna move to the States.
translation.it: Se ti daranno il posto, Segev si dovrà trasferire negli USA.
Le relazioni a distanza sono difficili.

translation.en: But you two can make it work. I know you can.
translation.it: Ma voi potete farla funzionare. Di sicuro.

translation.en: You've been through so much already.
I knew him when he was married to Shira.
translation.it: Lo conobbi quando era sposato con Shira.

translation.en: Those two, it wasn't a good thing.
There was no laughter, no joy...

translation.it: Tu gli hai cambiato la vita.

translation.en: I'm gonna grab a cup of coffee.
-[in Hebrew] Good morning, Tzion. -Good morning, Dani.
[in English] Uh, two double espressos please.
-Up for a game, beautiful? -I can't today, Yossi.
translation.it: - Ti va una partita? - Oggi no, Yossi.

translation.en: -I gotta catch a plane. -[Yossi] Where to?
translation.it: - Devo prendere un volo. - Dove vai?

translation.en: -New York. -[Yossi] Give my best to Barbra Streisand!
translation.it: - A New York. - Salutami Barbra Streisand!

translation.en: -[Yossi] And buy me Walkman and Reebok! -[laughing] Okay.
[in Hebrew] What are you doing? Don't touch that!
[in English] No, no, no, Danielle, stay with me.
translation.it: No, no, no, Danielle, resta con me.
La città aveva bisogno di acqua.

translation.en: King Herod built this aqueduct 2,000 years ago,
translation.it: Re Erode costruì questo acquedotto 2000 anni fa,

translation.en: -and it stretches from here to-- -[cell phone ringing]
translation.it: e si estende da qui fino... Un secondo.

translation.en: Just a second. I'm sorry. Okay?
They worked on her for more than an hour and...
translation.it: L'hanno operata per oltre un'ora e...

translation.en: -We got here the minute you called. -Where is she? I want to see her.
translation.it: - Siamo venuti il prima possibile. - Dov'è? Voglio vederla.

translation.en: The doctors did everything they could.
translation.it: I dottori hanno fatto tutto il possibile.

translation.en: When your wife was struck by the car,
translation.it: Quando l'auto ha colpito sua moglie,

translation.en: she suffered a severe blow to her head.
translation.it: ha subito un grave trauma cranico.

translation.en: She stopped breathing on the way to the hospital.
translation.it: Ha smesso di respirare in ambulanza.

translation.en: By the time she got here, she was in full arrest.
translation.it: Quando è arrivata, era in pieno arresto cardiaco.

translation.en: We worked on her for quite a while, but we weren't able to...
translation.it: Abbiamo fatto tutto il possibile per rianimarla...

translation.en: I'm very sorry for your loss.
translation.it: Mi spiace per la sua perdita.

translation.en: I need to be alone with her.
They did everything they could. I'm sorry.
translation.it: Hanno fatto il possibile. Mi spiace.

translation.en: It was a hit-and-run accident. She was crossing the street.
translation.it: Stava attraversando. Il responsabile è fuggito.

translation.en: You want me to speak with Marcia?
No, no. I'll talk to her.
We'll leave as soon as we can get a flight.
[Moshe in Hebrew] So many people tried to help her. The guys from the coffee shop--
translation.it: In molti hanno provato ad aiutarla. La gente nella caffetteria...

translation.en: I just held her hand, Segev.
translation.it: Le ho solo tenuto la mano, Segev.

translation.en: -I tried to comfort her, as best I could. -Excuse me, are you her husband?
translation.it: - Ho cercato di darle conforto. - Mi scusi, lei è il marito?

translation.en: Did you find the guy that killed her?
Not yet. We're working on it.
There are stores on that street. Cameras? Have you checked?
translation.it: Ci sono negozi in strada. Telecamere? Avete controllato?

translation.en: We'll get to that soon. Don't worry.
-What are you doing here? -[man] Please calm down.
translation.it: - Cosa ci fate qui? - La prego, si calmi.

translation.en: I'm calm. What are you doing? Instead of finding the asshole?
translation.it: Sono calmo. Cosa fate, anziché trovare quello stronzo?

translation.en: Segev. Enough. Let them do their job.
Enough, enough. I need to get some air.
translation.it: Basta. Ho bisogno di una boccata d'aria.

translation.en: -[Segev] The police were just here. -What've they got?
translation.it: - È appena venuta la polizia. - Che cos'hanno?

translation.en: They don't have the driver, they haven't found the car.
I don't trust them at all.
I've got to go pick up Ella now.
translation.it: Ora devo andare a prendere Ella.

translation.en: I'll call as soon as I know anything.
translation.it: Ti chiamo non appena so qualcosa.

translation.en: Shapira. What are you doing here?
At least two people in the car. Both male, witnesses said.
translation.it: Almeno due persone nell'auto. Entrambi maschi, secondo i testimoni.

translation.en: You can see the skid marks, which start here and end there.
translation.it: Si vedono i segni della frenata, iniziano qui e finiscono lì.

translation.en: But she was struck by the car here.
translation.it: Ma lei è stata colpita dall'auto qui.

translation.en: [Tali] Looks like it took them a while to stop. [Boaz] My guess?
translation.it: - Ci hanno messo a fermarsi. - La mia idea?

translation.en: The driver was probably on the phone or texting when he hit her.
translation.it: Forse l'autista era al telefono o messaggiava.

translation.en: Maybe he jammed on the brakes, realized she was really messed up,
translation.it: Forse ha inchiodato, ha capito che era malridotta,
ha avuto paura ed è fuggito.

translation.en: We haven't identified the plate yet,
translation.it: Non abbiamo ancora identificato la targa,

translation.en: but I got a couple guys in local stores downloading the video footage.
translation.it: ma ho un paio di uomini che stanno scaricando i filmati di sicurezza.

translation.en: I got a hit on the plate.
And guess what, this car was reported stolen this morning.
translation.it: E indovina, hanno denunciato il furto stamattina.

translation.en: [Boaz] Put out an APB for the BMW.
translation.it: Diffondi un allerta per la BMW.

translation.en: I want everyone looking for it.
Well, you're not gonna believe who owns ShalCorp Investments.
translation.it: Non indovinerai di chi è la ShalCorp Investments.

translation.en: This is Detective Tali Shapira. Your husband reported his SUV stolen.
translation.it: Sono la detective Tali Shapira. Suo marito ha denunciato il furto del SUV.

translation.en: Okay... can you give me his cell number?
translation.it: Ok, può darmi il suo numero di cellulare?

translation.en: Yes, sure. I'm just following up.
-[in English] That's some good music. -[woman] Yeah!
translation.it: - Questa sì che è musica. - Sì!

translation.en: Brought some life into the room. Add some life into it.
What about the beach? What's your favorite beach in Tel Aviv?
translation.it: Qual è la tua spiaggia preferita a Tel Aviv?

translation.en: Don't you have beaches in New York?
translation.it: Non avete spiagge a New York?

translation.en: Yeah, but this is the Mediterranean.
translation.it: Sì, ma questo è il Mediterraneo.

translation.en: It's my home now, so I want to know where the locals go.
translation.it: Ora è casa mia, perciò voglio sapere dove va la gente del luogo.
A me piace Tel Baruch Beach.

translation.en: It's in the north of Tel Aviv.
translation.it: È a nord di Tel Aviv.

translation.en: -Tel Baruch. -I'll take you there one day.
[Segev] You guys are here, right? At the Jaffa Hostel?
-[both] Yeah. -So get the fuck out of my car.
translation.it: - Sì. - Allora fuori dalla mia auto.

translation.en: Which hotel are you staying at?
Actually, I have an apartment in Neve Tzedek.
translation.it: A dire il vero ho un appartamento a Neve Tzedek.

translation.en: I've been dancing for the past year with Batsheva.
translation.it: Nell'ultimo anno ho ballato con Batsheva.

translation.en: -I can give you a ride home. -Are you sure?
translation.it: - Posso accompagnarti a casa. - Sei sicuro?

translation.en: Yeah, I just have to pick up my daughter first.
translation.it: Sì, prima devo solo andare a prendere mia figlia.
- È lungo la strada. - Nessun problema.

translation.en: So is your wife a tour guide too?
translation.it: Anche tua moglie è una guida?

translation.en: Hey, Ella. This is Danielle. She's an American.
translation.it: Ehi, Ella. Lei è Danielle. È americana.

translation.en: [Danielle] My Hebrew sucks. I like it.
translation.it: - Non sono brava a parlare ebraico. - A me piace.

translation.en: Thank you. That was really fun.
So where we going next time?
translation.it: Allora, dove andiamo la prossima volta?

translation.en: I'll leave it up to you.
[in Hebrew] I like her a lot.
[Tali] That's him, Rami, and his associate, Nissim Bensimon.
translation.it: È lui, Rami, e il suo socio, Nissim Bensimon.

translation.en: So who's going to talk to him?
No, not here. It's too crowded.
translation.it: No, non qui. C'è troppa gente.

translation.en: -We're in a pursuit after a blue BMW. -[siren wailing]
translation.it: Siamo all'inseguimento di una BMW blu.

translation.en: 401, get us a roadblock. We're moving fast.
translation.it: 401, approntate un posto di blocco. Procediamo veloci.
- Gira a destra, dietro di lui. - Attenta!

translation.en: [in Hebrew] We'll catch them on Raban Gamliel.
Hold on tight. We're gonna catch this motherfucker.
translation.it: Reggiti. Prenderemo questo figlio di puttana.

translation.en: Rami, listen to me carefully. Get out of the car right now.
translation.it: Rami, mi ascolti attentamente. Esca subito dall'auto.

translation.en: Get out of the fucking car!
translation.it: Esca da quella cazzo di auto!

translation.en: I already told you, it was stolen from my house this morning.
translation.it: Ve l'ho già detto, è stata rubata stamattina da casa mia.

translation.en: I didn't know who you were or what you wanted.
translation.it: Non sapevo chi foste né cosa voleste.

translation.en: you always walk around with 400,000 shekels in cash?
translation.it: gira sempre con 400.000 shekel in contanti?

translation.en: Recycling is very lucrative these days.
translation.it: Riciclare rende molto di questi tempi.

translation.en: [Boaz] Where were you this morning, around 7:55?
Yeah, I was taking a shit.
What the fuck? What is this about?
translation.it: Che cazzo? Qual è il problema?

translation.en: This morning, a young woman was hit by a car as she was crossing the street.
translation.it: Stamattina una donna è stata investita mentre attraversava la strada.

translation.en: I want to talk to my lawyer.
[in English] The whole company is just devastated.
[in Hebrew] I can't imagine how her parents are feeling.
translation.it: Non oso immaginare come stiano i suoi genitori.

translation.en: [Danielle in English] Hi, you've reached Danielle's phone.
Leave a message after the beep and I'll call you back.
translation.it: Lasciate un messaggio e vi richiamerò.

translation.en: Leave a message after the beep and I'll call you back.
translation.it: Lasciate un messaggio e vi richiamerò.

translation.en: Hi, you've reached Danielle's phone. Leave a message after the beep and--
translation.it: Salve, sono Danielle. Lasciate un messaggio e vi...

translation.en: Last night, we were at the Suzanne Dellal Center. I saw this guy.
translation.it: Ieri sera al Suzanne Dellal Center. Ho visto un tizio.

translation.en: -And I think this morning I saw him-- -Segev, I got him.
translation.it: - E stamattina l'ho visto... - Segev, l'ho trovato.

translation.en: We put together some photos, got a witness ID.
translation.it: Abbiamo raccolto delle foto, c'è un testimone.

translation.en: Looks like it was an accident.
We're charging him with vehicular manslaughter
translation.it: Lo accusiamo di omicidio stradale colposo
Il suo telefono e la borsetta.

translation.en: I want to stay with Dad tonight.
Call me if you need anything.
Shira, I'll bring Ella home tomorrow.
translation.it: Shira, domani porterò Ella a casa.

translation.en: Elush, go get ready for bed. I'll come up and say goodnight.
translation.it: Elush, vai a letto. Poi vengo a darti la buonanotte.

translation.en: Two minutes. I'll go to the supermarket.
-Are you kidding me? -Sure. I might even smoke one with you.
translation.it: - Mi prendi in giro? - Certo. Magari ne fumo una con te.

translation.en: They're waiting for you upstairs, sir.
[Sharon] Sorry for calling you so late at night,
but there is an incident that requires our attention.
translation.it: ma un incidente richiede la nostra attenzione.

translation.en: and it looks like we have a problem.
translation.it: e sembra che abbiamo un problema.

translation.en: Head of Armed Intelligence will get here later with more solid information.
translation.it: Il capo dell'intelligence armata verrà qui più tardi con informazioni concrete.

translation.en: [Assaf in English] Hey, my love. Is everything okay?
translation.it: Ehi, amore mio. Va tutto bene?

translation.en: You have to trace that number.
-You sure you want to go there? -You know I'm going to go there.
translation.it: - Sicuro di volerci andare? - Lo sai che ci andrò.

translation.en: I have to see you at the Shoftim. I have to see you."
translation.it: Devo vederti al Shoftim. Devo vederti."

translation.en: Rami Shalem, known as one of the most notorious gangsters in Israel,
translation.it: Rami Shalem, uno dei più noti criminali israeliani,

translation.en: was arrested for a suspected hit-and-run murder.
translation.it: è stato arrestato per un atto di pirateria stradale.

translation.en: The deceased is a young American woman,
translation.it: La vittima è una giovane donna americana,

translation.en: Azulai, a dancer with the Batsheva Dance Company,
translation.it: Azulai, ballerina della compagnia di danza Batsheva,

translation.en: was hit as she was crossing the road.
translation.it: è stata investita mentre attraversava la strada.

translation.en: She was rushed to the hospital where she was declared dead.
translation.it: È stata portata in ospedale dove ne è stato dichiarato il decesso.

translation.en: That's awful. I know her from the company.
translation.it: È terribile. La conoscevo nella compagnia.

translation.en: I should call Ohad Naharin. He's going to be devastated.
translation.it: Dovrei chiamare Ohad Naharin. Ne rimarrà sconvolto.

translation.en: [Segev in English] Where are we going next time? I'll leave it up to you.
translation.it: - Dove andiamo la prossima volta? - Lascio decidere a te.

translation.en: Just had the most amazing day at the Jerusalem mountains.
translation.it: Ho passato una magnifica giornata sulle montagne di Gerusalemme.

translation.en: The tour went a little long.
Who was that dropping you off?
The tour guide and his 10-year-old daughter.
translation.it: La guida turistica e sua figlia di 10 anni.

translation.en: I don't know if this is working for me.
translation.it: Non so se questa cosa funzioni.

translation.en: I just don't have the time to wait around for you.
My life is very complicated. You don't seem to understand that.
translation.it: La mia vita è molto complicata. Non lo capisci.

translation.en: I do the best I can. We have different schedules.
translation.it: Faccio il meglio che posso. Abbiamo orari diversi.

translation.en: -If you don't feel good about us, then... -Danielle.
translation.it: - Se non sei sicuro di noi, beh... - Danielle.

translation.en: My marriage is falling apart, I'm under tremendous stress at work.
translation.it: Il mio matrimonio sta andando a pezzi, sono sotto pressione al lavoro.

translation.en: You're the only thing I feel good about right now.
translation.it: Sei l'unica cosa che mi fa stare bene.

translation.en: Then why are we talking like this?
Daddy, what happened? Why are you bleeding?
All good. Here put this on. I'm taking you to Mom's. Let's go.
translation.it: Va tutto bene. Mettiti questo. Ti porto dalla mamma. Andiamo.

translation.en: Come to me. Hold on tight.
Close your eyes. Close your eyes, okay?
translation.it: Chiudi gli occhi. Chiudi gli occhi, ok?
- Niente. Chiudi gli occhi. - Cos'è successo?

translation.en: -Don't go back there, Daddy. -I'll be fine. Don't worry.
translation.it: - Non tornare lì, papà. - Me la caverò. Non temere.

translation.en: There was an intruder in my house. He's dead.
translation.it: C'era un intruso in casa mia. È morto.
